results.name: Simulation of the collection of garbage

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Xeon W-2145
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can probably run this game

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Xeon W-21.45
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro Vega 56
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can probably run this game

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10510U or similar
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10870H
